q_ch: 在我们的所有仓库中，库存不为0的原材料有哪些，整理成{类型：剩余数量}的形式。
q_en: What are the raw materials with non zero inventory in all of our warehouses, organized in the form of 'Type: Remaining Quantity'?

steps.sql: SELECT m.name AS Type, SUM(wm.left_number) AS 'Remaining Quantity' FROM warehouse_material wm JOIN materials m ON wm.material_id = m.id WHERE wm.left_number > 0 AND m.type = 'origin' GROUP BY m.name;
steps.description: Retrieve the raw materials with non-zero inventory from all warehouses, and organize the results in the form of 'Type: Remaining Quantity'.

response:
Sure thing! Here's a list of raw materials with non-zero inventory in all of our warehouses, organized just for you. Check it out below! 😄

| Type              | Remaining Quantity |
|-------------------|--------------------|
| Cotton Fabric     | 3500               |
| Denim Fabric      | 4500               |
| Down              | 1230               |
| Down Pieces       | 2420               |
| Leather           | 2200               |
| Silk              | 1100               |
| Synthetic Fiber   | 2300               |
| Wool              | 4100               |

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask! 😊
